posts.text: Post 271: Today I felt sad. I had a hard time getting out of bed and felt overwhelmed.
maladaptive_evidence: I felt sad and struggled with daily tasks.

posts.text: Post 272: Today I felt hopeful. I did some productive work and went for a walk.
adaptive_evidence: I felt hopeful today and took positive actions.
